槽.definition: trough; manger; groove; channel; (Tw) (computing) hard drive

槽坊.definition: brewery; papermaking craft shop (in former times)

槽點.definition: (slang) an aspect that invites ridicule (e.g. a film's plot inconsistencies or unrealistic character behavior)

槽齒類.definition: thecodont (type of reptile that existed in the Permian and Triassic Periods)
